_details.name: OK
_details.detail: Standard response for successful HTTP requests. The actual response will depend on the request method used. In a GET request, the response will contain an entity corresponding to the requested resource. In a POST request the response will contain an entity describing or containing the result of the action.

_details.name: Created
_details.detail: The request has been fulfilled and resulted in a new resource being created.

_details.name: OK
_details.detail: Standard response for successful HTTP requests. The actual response will depend on the request method used. In a GET request, the response will contain an entity corresponding to the requested resource. In a POST request the response will contain an entity describing or containing the result of the action.

_details.name: OK
_details.detail: Standard response for successful HTTP requests. The actual response will depend on the request method used. In a GET request, the response will contain an entity corresponding to the requested resource. In a POST request the response will contain an entity describing or containing the result of the action.

_details.name: No Content
_details.detail: The server successfully processed the request, but is not returning any content.

_details.name: Not Found
_details.detail: The requested resource could not be found but may be available again in the future. Subsequent requests by the client are permissible.
